name: Pajama Man and The Spooky Cave
name_original: Pajama Man and The Spooky Cave
description:
Ludum Dare 39 Entry. Theme: Running Out Of Power

Team: Joseph Bedsole (Art), John Hawley (Programming)

Pajama Man has stumbled into a spooky cave and has only the batteries he brought for his flashlight. Escape the cave before it runs out of power!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow - Move

Mouse - Point flashlight

Left Click - Toggle Flashlight

R - Restart

GitHub Repo: https://github.com/jh318/LD39
